name: Cambrian College
story: You start your journey to find the diamond from a story you heard from your history professor at College.
nav: Press 1 to go to the New Sudbury Center Mall, Press 2 to go to the Cambrian Residence or Press 4 to Exit

name: New Sudbury Center
story: You are at the Mall and meet a colleague who knows about the next stage in your journey. You are suggested two choices
nav: Press 1 to go to Dollarama, Press 2 to go to Walmart or Press 4 to Exit

name: Dollarama
story: You are Dollarama now and meet the Cashier and ask for advice on your journey. The Cashier suggests two new locations!
nav: Press 1 to go to Pizza Hut, Press 2 to go to Marks or Press 4 to Exit

name: Walmart
story: You are now at Walmart. You see many people here but are unable to locate Jerico. However, you remember that Jerico might be at Marks
nav: Press 1 to go to Marks or Press 4 to Exit

name: Pizza Hut
story: You are at the Pizza Hut, but it seems to be the wrong location!!
nav: Press 1 to go back to Dollarama, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Marks
story: Now, you are at Marks. Here you meet Jerico, and he suggests three locations!
nav: Press 1 to go to Lowes, Press 2 to go to Home Depot, Press 3 to go to Costco, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Lowes
story: Lowes seems to be a dead end! You don't know where to go next! Try playing again!

name: Home Depot
story: You are at Home Depot! There may be some tools that could be useful if you make a purchase! You also overheard a stranger and now know the next location!
nav: Press 1 to go to Silver City, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Costco
story: You are at Costco! There may be some tools that could be useful if you make a purchase! You also overheard a stranger and now know the next location!
nav: Press 1 to go to Silver City, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Silver City
story: You are now in Silver City! You now come across a stranger that you can slightly identify! The stranger gives you two new locations and an advice!
nav: Press 1 to go to A&W, Press 2 to go to the Transit Terminal, or Press 4 to Exit

name: A & W
story: You now reach A&W, only to realize that you have lost some health! The staff who knows about the following location will not tell you unless you buy something to eat! Buy some food before proceeding!
nav: Press 1 to go to the Transit Terminal, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Transit Terminal
story: You now reach the Transit! It looks like the journey was too long! But if you want the diamond, you will have to proceed! You don't need any help at the Transit because your professor told you about the two possible locations from here!
nav: Press 1 to go to YMCA, Press 2 to go to the Ramsey Lake, or Press 4 to Exit

name: YMCA
story: Your friend, a YMCA receptionist, tells you to meet John at the Sudbury Police Station for more information!
nav: Press 1 to go to the Police Station, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Sudbury Police Station
story: You tell the wrong John about your plans! Busted!!

name: Cambrian Residence
story: You are the Cambrian Residence, and here you meet Rosie. She tells you about the two possible locations to proceed with your journey!
nav: Press 1 to go to Little Caesars, Press 2 to go to LCBO, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Little Caesars
story: At Little Caesars, you find a clue to your next location!
nav: Press 1 to go to Marks or Press 4 to Exit

name: LCBO
story: You are at LCBO and here a drunk stranger gives you a piece of advice along with two possible next locations!
nav: Press 1 to go to Real Canadian Super Store, Press 2 to go to the Audi Showroom, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Real Canadian Super Store
story: The drunk stranger gave you the wrong location! Here you find nothing! Try playing again!

name: Audi Showroom
story: The showroom is filled with customers, and the person you want to meet is busy! You don't have all the day so you decide to go and grab a coffee!
nav: Press 1 to go to Starbucks, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Starbucks
story: While at Starbucks, you encounter your fellow History classmate, who is also looking for the exact diamond! You don't collaborate with him since you don't trust him. But yet, he gives you two possible locations!
nav: Press 1 to go to Silver City, Press 2 to go to Tim Hortons, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Tim Hortons
story: You decide to take his advice and go to Tim Hortons! Suddenly you meet the person you were looking for at the Audi showroom! Here you get two new locations!
nav: Press 1 to go to the Transit Terminal, Press 2 to go to Wendy's, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Wendy's
story: At Wendy's you are stopped by the manager before you get into the store! The manager tells you to go to either of the one locations and not come back here!
nav: Press 1 to go to the Transit Terminal, Press 2 to go to Radisson Hotel, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Radisson Hotel
story: At Radisson, you meet a friend! She tells you to visit Science North if you want to see the diamond!
nav: Press 1 to go to Science North, or Press 4 to Exit

name: Ramsey Lake
story: At Ramsey Lake, you meet a friend! She tells you to visit Science North if you want to see the diamond!

name: Science North
story: You now see a board that illustrates the exact diamond you are looking for! You then make a plan and steal it in the middle of the night! Hurray!!!
